## Explora

```{r reactbl}
library(reactablefmtr)
library(dplyr)

targets::tar_source()

video_club_clean_catalogue <- targets::tar_read(video_club_clean_catalogue) |> 
  mutate(
    poster = coalesce(poster,"No Poster")
  )

missing_poster <- video_club_clean_catalogue |> 
  filter(
    poster == "No Poster"
  )
  

tbl_movies_found(video_club_clean_catalogue)
```
